Title: Relates to restricting eminent domain powers of transportation corporations that are electric corporations
Summary: Restricts eminent domain powers of transportation corporations that are electric corporations under certain circumstances where projects extend beyond territorial borders of the United States.
LawCode: Amd ยง11, Transp Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation corporations law, in relation to restricting transportation corporations that are electric corporations from exercising the right of eminent domain
